Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 71st overall pick, by Cleveland in 1966...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/8/1969, off Roger Nelson (CHW)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/19/1970, off Gary Dotter (MIN)...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Minnesota on 9/25/1972...
Traded from Cleveland to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1973 (Going to CHC: CF D. Unser. Going to CLE: 1B F. Tepedino, RF L. Brown)...
